output.dependency: The flight number column (which indicates the flight's unique identifier) is associated with specific departure times, indicating that certain flights depart at certain times.
The flight number column correlates with subsequent arrival times, indicating that the same flight number has a fixed arrival time after departure.
The flight number column also correlates with gate arrival times, indicating that specific flights arrive at certain gates within a predictable time frame.
The flight number column links to specific estimated arrival times, indicating the expected landing time for the listed flights.
